Function reference

All functions

add_sentiment()
Measure sentiment
download_once()
Download a file once
drop_stopwords()
Remove stopwords
get_corpus()
Prepare a corpus or corpora of texts
interactive_document_topics()
Explore topics interactively
load_texts()
Load a folder or data frame of texts
make_topic_model()
Construct a topic model
measure_lexical_variety()
Measure lexical variety
measure_tf_idf()
Add measures for tf-idf
micusp_corpus()
Get a MICUSP corpus
micusp_metadata()
Get MICUSP metadata
plot_doc_word_bars()
Plot bar graphs of frequent features
plot_doc_word_heatmap()
Plot a heatmap of ranked features
plot_document_topics()
Plot topic distributions
plot_hapax()
Project hapax legomena onto vocabulary growth
plot_htr()
Show hapax-token ratio over time
plot_tf_idf()
Visualize the top terms by tf-idf
plot_topic_wordcloud()
Plot topic wordclouds
plot_ttr()
Show type-token ratio over time
plot_vocabulary()
Show vocabulary growth
pos_tags
Part of speech tags
standardize_titles()
Standardize document titles
unnest_without_caps()
Split text into words and drop proper nouns
